string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: If you could have any superpower, would you choose the ability to talk to squirrels or turn invisible when no one’s looking?
What’s the weirdest food combination you secretly love?
Would you rather have a pet dragon or a pet unicorn?
If your pet could talk, what do you think it would say about you?
What’s your go-to dance move when nobody’s watching?
If you could swap lives with a cartoon character for a day, who would it be?
What’s the silliest thing you’ve ever done for a dare?
If you could only eat one type of candy for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What would you do if you woke up one morning with purple hair and couldn’t change it?
If you could create a holiday, what would it be called and how would you celebrate it?
Would you rather have fingers for toes or toes for fingers?
If you could be any animal for a day, which one would you choose and why?
What’s the most embarrassing thing that’s ever happened to you in school?
If you could have a lifetime supply of any snack, what would it be?
What’s the weirdest dream you’ve ever had?
If you could travel back in time and meet any historical figure, who would it be and what would you ask them?
Would you rather always have to hop on one foot or skip everywhere you go?
If you could only wear one color for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What would you do if you found a talking potato in your fridge?
If you could make one rule that everyone in the world had to follow, what would it be?
Would you rather have a never-ending supply of pizza or ice cream?
If you were a superhero, what would your catchphrase be when you saved the day?
What’s the most bizarre thing you’ve ever seen a seagull do?
If you could make any animal the size of a house, which one would it be?
What would you do if you woke up one morning and gravity was reversed?
If you had to eat a whole jar of peanut butter in one sitting, would you choose smooth or crunchy?
What’s the most ridiculous fashion trend you’ve ever tried?
If you could turn any movie into a musical, which one would it be?
What’s the funniest joke you know by heart?
Would you rather have to sing everything you say or dance every time you walk?
If you could have a conversation with your pet, what’s the first thing you’d ask them?
What would you do if you could hear everyone’s thoughts for a day?
If you could make a potion that turns people into animals, what animal would you choose for your worst enemy?
What’s the strangest smell you’ve ever encountered?
If you could visit any planet in our solar system, which one would you go to?
What’s your go-to karaoke song when you’re feeling extra silly?
If you had a magic wand, what’s the first thing you’d use it for?
Would you rather have a pet dinosaur or a pet alien from outer space?
If you could live inside a video game, which one would it be?
What’s the most ridiculous food challenge you’d be willing to attempt?
If you could have a lifetime supply of any beverage, what would it be?
Would you rather have a talking pet hamster or a flying pet goldfish?
What would you do if you woke up with a unicorn horn on your forehead?
If you could have any job in the world for a day, what would it be?
What’s the most unusual talent you possess?
If you could make it rain anything besides water, what would you choose?
Would you rather have a pet penguin or a pet kangaroo?
What’s the most bizarre thing you’ve ever found in your backpack?
If you could have any animal as a sidekick, which one would it be?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever seen in a cloud formation?
If you could swap places with a famous person for a day, who would it be?
Would you rather have spaghetti for hair or marshmallows for teeth?
What’s the silliest thing you’ve ever done with a balloon?
If you could turn any book into a real-life adventure, which one would it be?
What would you do if you could control the weather for a day?
If you had to survive in the wilderness, what three items would you take with you?
Would you rather have a pet dinosaur that fits in your pocket or a pet elephant that can fly?
What’s the most absurd thing you’ve ever tried to teach your pet?
If you could make one animal the ruler of the world, which one would it be?
What would you do if you woke up with a tail like a monkey?
If you could turn any food into a musical instrument, what would it be?
What’s the funniest animal noise you can make?
Would you rather have a lifetime supply of bubblegum or confetti?
If you could communicate with one type of insect, which one would you choose?
What would you do if you discovered a secret portal to a different dimension in your closet?
If you could have a conversation with a plant, what plant would you choose?
Would you rather have a personal chef who only cooks pancakes or a personal DJ who only plays polka music?
What’s the most ridiculous thing you’ve ever tried to juggle?
If you could have a pet rock that granted wishes, what would you name it?
What would you do if you could turn into a giant rubber duck for a day?
If you could have a robot that did one silly task for you, what would it be?
Would you rather have a talking stuffed animal or a singing refrigerator?
What’s the craziest adventure you’ve ever imagined while looking at clouds?
If you could make any food float in the air, which one would it be?
What would you do if your favorite cartoon character showed up at your front door?
If you could have a parade in your honor, what would it be called?
Would you rather have a pet monkey that can talk or a pet sloth that can dance?
What’s the most outrageous hairstyle you’ve ever wanted to try?
If you could turn any vegetable into a superhero, which one would it be?
What would you do if you could make your bed teleport to any location?
If you could have a pet cloud that rained your favorite drink, what would it be?
Would you rather have a closet full of costumes or a secret hideout in your backyard?
What’s the most ridiculous way you’ve ever tried to impress someone?
If you could have a theme song that played whenever you entered a room, what would it be?
What would you do if you discovered a treasure map in a bottle on the beach?
If you could have a talking pillow, what would you ask it?
Would you rather have a pet octopus with a top hat or a pet giraffe on roller skates?
What’s the most hilarious sound effect you can mimic?
If you could make any vegetable dance, which one would you choose?
What would you do if you woke up in a world made entirely of candy?
If you could have a magic pen that brought your drawings to life, what would you draw first?
Would you rather have a personal cloud that follows you everywhere or a talking toaster that tells jokes?
What’s the goofiest face you can make on command?
If you could make it snow something other than snowflakes, what would it be?
What would you do if you discovered a secret tunnel in your backyard?
If you could have a pet dragon that breathed bubbles instead of fire, what color would the bubbles be?
Would you rather have a closet full of shoes that make you jump super high or hats that give you crazy hairstyles?
What’s the most ridiculous way you’ve ever tried to travel from one room to another?
If you could have a magic backpack that produced any snack you wanted, what snack would it make first?
What would you do if you could make your voice sound like any animal?
If you could have a pet robot that does your homework, what would you name it?
Would you rather have a personal theme song that plays whenever you talk or a personal cloud that shades you from the sun?
What’s the silliest thing you’ve ever drawn on the sidewalk with chalk?
If you could have a conversation with a talking tree, what kind of tree would it be?
What would you do if you found a treasure chest filled with rubber ducks?
If you could make it rain any type of candy, what would you choose?
Would you rather have a pet penguin that can tap dance or a pet kangaroo that tells jokes?
What’s the most ridiculous way you’ve ever tried to wake someone up?
If you could have a pet cloud that turns into any shape you want, what shape would it be right now?
If you could make any food sing a song, what food would you choose?
What would you do if you could make your voice sound like a robot for a day?
Would you rather have a personal robot that does your chores or a personal unicorn that gives you rides to school?
What’s the most bizarre thing you’ve ever found in your lunchbox?
If you could have a pet dragon that only breathes bubbles, what flavor would the bubbles be?
If you could make any vegetable talk, which one would it be?
What would you do if you discovered a hidden room in your house filled with candy?
If you could have a magic remote control that paused time, what’s the first thing you’d do?
Would you rather have a pet sloth that can do magic tricks or a pet flamingo that can sing opera?
What’s the craziest way you’ve ever tried to make someone laugh?
If you could have a personal cloud that follows you and plays your favorite music, what song would it play right now?
What would you do if you could make it snow confetti instead of snowflakes?
If you could have a pet robot that told you jokes all day, what would you name it?
Would you rather have a talking backpack or a flying skateboard?
What’s the most outrageous hat you’ve ever worn?
If you could have a magic wand that turned anything into candy, what would you wave it at first?
What would you do if you could turn any vegetable into a superhero costume?
If you could have a pet dragon that could only say one word, what word would it be?
Would you rather have a personal theme song that plays every time you jump or a talking umbrella that gives you compliments?
What’s the goofiest dance move you can come up with?
If you could have a magic pen that drew invisible pictures, what would you draw?
What would you do if you could make your voice sound like a chipmunk for a day?
Would you rather have a personal cloud that rains confetti or a pet unicorn that farts glitter?
What’s the most ridiculous way you’ve ever tried to start a conversation with someone?
If you could have a pet robot that danced to your favorite song, what song would it dance to?
If you could have a talking tree as a friend, what would you name it?
What would you do if you found a treasure chest filled with rubber chickens?
If you could make it rain any type of fruit, what fruit would you choose?
Would you rather have a pet penguin that wears sunglasses or a pet kangaroo that can do backflips?
What’s the craziest way you’ve ever tried to solve a problem?
If you could have a personal cloud that gave you shade on hot days, what shape would it be right now?
What would you do if you could make your voice sound like a robot monkey for a day?
Would you rather have a pet robot that can bake cookies or a pet unicorn that can grant wishes?
What’s the most outrageous thing you’ve ever tried to fit in your backpack?
If you could have a magic remote control that made any food appear in front of you, what food would you choose?
What would you do if you could turn any vegetable into a talking puppet?
If you could have a pet dragon that only knows how to do the moonwalk, would you teach it any other dance moves?
Would you rather have a personal theme song that plays whenever you sneeze or a talking umbrella that tells jokes?
What’s the funniest face you can make on command?
If you could have a magic pen that made your drawings come to life as miniature versions of themselves, what would you draw first?
What would you do if you woke up one day and all the colors in the world were swapped?
